pr_title: #2274, #2023 Fix problems with property mapping using source parameters

timeline.message:
#2274, #2023 Fix problems with property mapping using source parameters

Fixes problems when property mapping is using source parameter and has default value / expression or is doing an update

timeline.bodyText: add in the comment this is auto-unboxing..
timeline.author: sjaakd

timeline.bodyText: This is a strange one.. NullValueCheckStrategy does concern parameters, not bean properties.. Do you remember why this one is here? Perhaps it requires some more comment 😄
timeline.author: sjaakd

replies.bodyText: I think that you are talking about NullValueMappingStrategy. The NullValueCheckStrategy is for properties
replies.author: filiphr

timeline.bodyText: comment: 'a type conversion is applied' so null check is required.
timeline.author: sjaakd
